description.en: Cheap bastard is a web app that allows users to track their favourite products' prices from some Romanian online shops, thus helping them to find out the best deals. Main features include authentication, web scraping for products' data and a scheduled job that updates the prices. Check it here: https://cheap-bastard.herokuapp.com/.
description.ro: Cheap bastard e o aplicatie web care permite utilizatorilor sa urmareasca pretul produselor lor favorite de la diverse magazine din Romania, astfel ajutandu-i sa ia cele mai bune decizii. Feature-rile principale includ autentificaer, web scraping pentru pretul produselor si un background task care actualizeaza preturilor. Il poti verifica aici: https://cheap-bastard.herokuapp.com/

description.en: FoodVision is a calorie-tracking mobile app that uses a deep learning model to recognise food from pictures and fetch nutritional values associated with it. Other features include authentication, history of logged meals and consumed macronutrients statistics for the day. This served as my practical support for my bachelor thesis
description.ro: FoodVision e o aplicatie mobila pentru urmariea caloriilor care utilizeaza un model de deep learning pentru a recunoaste mancare din imagini si asociaza valori nutritionale corespunzatoare. Alte functionalitati includ autentificre, istoria meselor logte si statistici privind consumul de macronutrienti pentru o zi. Acest proiect a servit ca parte practica pentru lucarea mea de licenta.
